## DecordersOptions type

URL of the library required if GLTF data is compressed. If omitted, decompress with default values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DecordersOptions = {
    dracoDecoderPath?: string;
    basisTranscoderPath?: string;
    meshoptDecoderPath?: string;
};
```

## Remarks

[DRACOLoader](https://threejs.org/docs/#examples/en/loaders/DRACOLoader)<!-- -->, [KTX2Loader](https://threejs.org/docs/?q=KTX2Loader#examples/en/loaders/KTX2Loader)<!-- -->, [GLTFLoader](https://threejs.org/docs/?q=gltfl#examples/en/loaders/GLTFLoader)
